comment.author: 26022992@N07
comment._content: Four metre Prussian Grenadier executed for sleeping while on guard duty.

comment.author: 29802266@N07
comment._content: Now that does appear to be a staged scene.  The fellow nearest the camera is on his own programme, seeming to have found a pheasant to shoot at.

comment.author: 12306929@N04
comment._content: I think he had to have been taller than just 4 meters !  Besides think of the manpower necessary to dig a grave that big ?
